name: Flee The Castle
description:
Help the knight to flee the invasion while avoiding the castle's traps.
Test your reflexes jumping and sliding at the right moments and try to pick up the golden coins along the way.
Login with your Google Play Games account and save your best score in the Hall of Fame.

Check it out on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LightsAndSouls.FleeTheCastle

Special thanks to the following creators for the amazing assets:
